start.text: A figure in soot-stained overalls looks up from a heap of scrap. His goggles pulse with a faint orange light. 'Hold there, Traveller. This sector is designated Cogwheel Salvage. What's your business in the Rust Fields?'

options.text: [Intimidate] Move aside. I'm taking what I need.

exploring.text: He grunts, lowering a heavy wrench. 'Exploring? Dangerous hobby. The Imaginum is thick here. Stay on the marked paths if you want to keep your skin from turning to glass.'

about_faction.text: We're the grease in the gears of what's left. While others pray to trees or hide in holes, we salvage the past to build a future. Order, efficiency, and cold hard iron.

options.text: A noble goal. I respect the grind.
Sounds like you're just hoarding junk.

respect.text: A rare flicker of a smile crosses his face. 'Someone who understands. Hereâ€”take this. A spare filter. Might keep the soot out of your lungs.'

insult.text: His posture stiffens. 'Junk? This 'junk' is the only thing keeping the lights on. Move on, before I decide you're just more scrap to be processed.'

hostile.text: He grips his wrench with both hands. 'Try it. You'll find out that Cogwheel iron is harder than it looks.'

battle_start.text: The scavenger readies his tool for combat!

end.text: The scavenger returns to his work, ignoring you.
